place.name: BENTLEY
place.gazetteerText: BENTLEY, a hamlet in Shustoke parish, Warwick; 3 miles SW of Atherstone. Acres, 1,830. Real property, £2,749. Pop., 233. Houses, 50. It includes Bentley Park; and forms a chapelry annexed to the vicarage of Shustoke. The church was built in 1844. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
